name: Impostor Hide (offline/ old version)
description:
Ok so the game is made by @MoustacheBanana and i posted the old version wich dosen't have multiplayer (idk there might be my save in this game but i dont't really care). Multiplayer makes me go AUUUUUUGHHHHH and i hate it so ye.
